name: BLUE HAZE
description: it's challenging for an artist to rely on social media to get their work seen. we constantly face the unjustly bias decree of algorithms. it's even more disheartening knowing that because the color of my skin i am subject to unnecessary censorships. i will do everything i can to break past the barriers i have to face as a creator in the 21st century where Ai fights against people like me. its ALSO clear that creators are flagged for unknown reasons where skin tone has nothing to do with it. BLUE HAZE is a piece created out of the frustrations that come with being silenced on the internet. it's a permanent feeling of gratitude i have from any iota of likes/shares/retweets by anyone advocating for my work. you help me bend passed these invisible restrictions. by LEEAUX | WWW.LEEAUX.COM
